XIV.4.D.14.f
.
Considering Protected SC Evaluations in IU Cases
Use the table below to determine when service-connected (SC) evaluations are protected in IU cases.
If earnings began …
Then …
after protection
take no further action.
before protection
complete development is required because benefits are subject to reduction if continuation of the rating is based on fraud or sustained improvement in the SC disability.
Reference
:  For more information on fraud, see
38 CFR 3.1(aa)(2)
.
Reference
:  For more information on protected evaluations, see
38 CFR 3.951
.
title: M21-1, Part XIV, Chapter 4, Section D - Federal Tax Information (FTI): Income Verification Match (IVM)
